duties_responsibilities.duty: Determine work methods, trade techniques, equipment, and materials for personnel under their supervision.
Assign work to subordinates and provide Quality Control for their work.
Perform diagnostic and repairs on building systems and prepare work schedules.
Train employees in the proper maintenance of building systems and coordinate maintenance and repair work.
Perform other duties as required by management.

education_certification.credential: Ten (10) years of experience as an Operating Engineer and possession of a current Stationary Operating Engineer (MD) or DC 3rd Class License.

At least two (2) years of experience directing personnel in O&M activities and a minimum of five (5) years of experience with operation and maintenance, repairs, and troubleshooting of chillers (> 500 Tons) and boilers (> 125 HP).
